column3: â€œWow, okay, this strand is crazy-insane. I hit it out of a bong, and have been blasted for hours. Definitely one of my favorites! Great taste, too. Makes me want to read and discuss politics and major world issues.â€

â€œI used Psd to wash away my problems with my bipolar disorder and it worked 100% I was calmer, happier, and all around relaxed. No mood spikes and it was almost impossible for me to get super low because I'd be laughing and having a good time.â€

â€œVery smooth milky smoke but still manages to pack a punch. I love the grape-diesel smell. Looks like Sour D just purple tinted and more of a purple smell. It makes you very medicated yet still focused. It had the sativa effects in the eyes but calming mellow mood of an indica. Good hybrid.â€

â€œThis is great for someone's first smoke like it was for me, because it won't hit you right away instead it slowly begins to creep in then after about 20 min that's when it hits hard but it won't leave you scared from any changes in gravity" instead the first effects to kick in are that your mind starts racing with ideas and colors begging to brighten. The effect continues to increase for about 30 min then that's whe...â€"
â€œI felt relaxed and pain relieved when smoking sour purp.. made me a little silly too haha. I like this strain. especially after an anxiety filled dayâ€

â€œPurple Sour Diesel by DAMA, is the holy grail. It's easily recognized by it's pale, dry, but sandy-grained appearance, as opposed to it's purple coloured counterparts.

This strain is easy on the throat, and is a power house, so small hits are suggested, as it will be comatose city. I highly recommend this variety for Restless Leg Syndrome and Diabetic Neuropathy. For a less sativa-ish" effect
â€œGot this from my bro .. I rolled this up in a backwood had me high af. Good if you need to relax and relieve some stress. I was creative while high on this I drew a lot.â€

â€œLuv this strain !! Total stress reliever , very uplifting ! Puts you in the moment , if you have anxiety , ptsd , depression , this really helps . Keeps you focused on the positive , instead of worrying about things that are out of your control . The deep purple buds are frosted over in trichomes , which also makes it have an incredible bag appeal , even tho I keep it in jars . Overall , one of my definite favsâ€

â€œI'm not positive, but there are several strains of this available from time to time. The flower from DAMA appears to be the very best in all of my experiments.
DAMA's PS Diesel is pale green, sometimes dry that has a very tiny-sandy kief. Doesn't seem sticky to the touch, but one hit of this will get you comatose enough to eliminate restless leg syndrome as well as diabetic neuropathy, both of which annoys enough to ...â€
â€œall around great, also has the signature sour smellâ€
â€œWOW ! Roll that backwoods outside ! Pungent is a solid 10 , minimal harshness , perfect balance of euphoria & focus , with a dose of energy ! This is top shelf ! HOLLAâ€
â€œVERY pungent, great smoke...Nice sensation to the head leaving uplifted also providing a good body high truly a mix of Sour D & Purp.â€
â€œPSD the drivah  ENERGIZING STRAIN RITE HERE MANG. G WARFIELD AKA Sour Deezalâ€

â€œdiddnt post my pic, and that pic looks like reggie so heres to a 2nd try.
Sour Diesel IBL x NJ Purple Kush.â€
â€œPK dominant. Can't seem to smell, taste, or feel the diesel in this one. Oh well.â€

â€œMy very first strain almost two years ago now I believe. The one that started it all. Very relaxing yet cerebral, creative high. I love this strain and wish I could find it again! Highly recommendâ€
â€œOne of my favorite strains. I love seeing the purple on it. Puts me in a very happy mellow mood, then puts me to sleep, and you wake up refreshed.â€

â€œWhenever I hit the dispensary, this is the strain I usually get when I have insomnia because if you smoke this after work around 6, you will sleep by 10. 4 hours of buzz then bedtime. 







https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B7Z8e0PzAQxHdVhiTHZtT205VTg/viewâ€

â€œOne hit on the bong then I was pretty stoned already. The weed is literately purple and taste like tropical. Little while I got stoned for 10minutes I was really really tired & sleepy but after that phase I was pretty energetic. Basically PSD have all the strength that you need for weed. It's all put in one. Munchies, imagination, tiredness & energetic & relaxation in 2 hours averageâ€

â€œA.P.C.C. $55 1/8th. I toked this out of a 16 inch dome + tree percolator ice bong. It was smooth, but that's probably because of the ice. The taste is delicate, but you can definitely taste the purple. The high is at first an immediate buzz behind the eyes and near the bottom back of your head, and I felt euphoric and motivated to do things. I toked this before I went to Best Buy and had a great time there.â€
â€œPK dominant. Can't seem to smell, taste, or feel the diesel in this one. Oh well.â€

â€œI love this strain for just being lazy and munching the hell out. Only complaint is how harsh it is on the throat; it made it very hard for me to take normal-sized hits. Purple Sour D makes for a very good night's sleep!â€

â€œMy first experience with med marijuana - made a coconut oil based salve for my hands & knees.  Pain free -1st time in 20 years.  Slowly quitting expensive biologics, prednisone, tramadol, zoloft & other pain meds - still trying to determine if inability to sleep is from withdrawal from these meds or marijuana.  Any help here?â€

â€œMy very first strain almost two years ago now I believe. The one that started it all. Very relaxing yet cerebral, creative high. I love this strain and wish I could find it again! Highly recommendâ€
â€œLove purps, love sour d.  Great hybrid.  Relaxing and mellow with some cerebral, creative hints.  Not a couch locker for me but good for nighttime ingestion.  Tasty!â€

â€œAwesome bud. Def deserves a way better rating on this site. I also disagree with some people and actually think its better and stronger than regular sour d.  This is like the perfect trees! My new favorite.â€
â€œOne of my favorites for evenings. Absolutely cannot stay awake for long after smoking some of this, so its my go to if I'm having trouble sleeping.â€
â€œtasty purps! a dab before bed to keep the sleep deep, and to wake up feeling like I actually got rest. thank you!â€
â€œThis is def one of my favorites!! Nice pungent smell and a pretty smooth taste!! The high kicks in almost immediately very good for pain and just chillenâ€

â€œGet it if you can.
Wonderful.. loved the heavy high that came with a desire for thought and conversation at the same  time, even simple pondering; brain activity's nice when things burn.
.. It is quite the heavy one, though, I'll admit, but nothing to stray from.. I'll also admit playing a video game (based off of a board game, so, strategy) was possible with a seemingly clear hear when it was obvious my head was clo...â€

â€œI'm always looking for something that gives me good pain relief and helps me de-stress.This strain, and especially the oil made from this strain, gives that and more. I slept so good! I started with the flower, and ended with the PSD oil rated at 50%THC.
If you have  serious pain issues, and haven't tried vaping yet, you should. The  concentrated form gives powerful pain relief.  Just take it easy as you build up you...â€

â€œWhat do you get when you combine two of the best strains on earth? Purple Sour Diesel thats what. â€œGot a half z of this from my buddy. The nugs were a beautiful yellow-green and purple with red spots and red hairs. The knobby buds wreeked of sweet fruity kerosene(if that smell is possible) and pine. The flavor was also complex, reversing roles and leading with a strong fruity taste that has a distinct sour kerosen and pine finish. The high shoots to your head, verrrry similar to sour d, but after while it balances...â€

â€œIf your into being active and productive after getting lit , this bud is for you. 
    Any sour D in any strain seems to always  not disappoint.â€
â€œWill definetly give you dry mouth, get water before lighting it! Good high though.â€

â€œOne of my absolute favorites strains.

Big Purple nugs covered in powdery trichomes. The smell is like sour grapes, very sour, and it shines through when you smoke it. (try making a twax of this with some Tangie Oil and it tastes spectacular.)

The high is extremely euphoric and energetic, but feels like a wave of relaxation washing over you at the same time. I could easily fall asleep with this, or go on a hike. or ...â€

â€œI suffer from anxiety, and no matter the hit, I was in for a gnarly ride of fear, paranoia and scatterbrain disconnect. This lasted for as long as peaks generally last; and boy is that peak of Everest proportions.

Once I became grounded is when I really began to appreciate the strain. For me, my euphoria was triggered by activities that required both focus & interaction. The sensation was uplifting both mentally and...â€
â€œgot a gram of flower of this! love it! great tase and great relaxing qualities. nice leafy buds!â€

â€œI've found that DAMA Oil's variety to be the best so far. There strain is pale green and very frosty. Other strains that claim to be Purple Sour Diesel are .... very purple and the effect, while still good, is not the DAMA variety. 

This stuff is one hit and you are comatose, so it is great for sleeping, meditating and not for the faint of heart. But, that's just me.

As of 1/21/15, there is a rumour going around th...â€

Not much of any high what so ever... just ate a lot after smoking 2 bow...â€

â€œsurprisingly potent for a hybrid strain I just got an eighth of it today and smoke one blunt and I'm totally lit. it smells fruity plus a hint of sour. If i did this during the day i would probably only smoke half the blunt because it's strong but it's a good nighttime bud if you wanna sleep.â€

â€œHybrid is right! You can feel the perfect balence between indica and sativa. within seconds the strain makes my eyelids heavy. You can easily let yourself couch lock but you have the control to change gears and perk up. That's why I like this one as a wake n' bake. And for someone who's eyes get blood shot from one hit, my eyes are pearls after this strain. No red eye. An overall Fantastic strain.â€

â€œOne of my favorite strains till this day. Very euphoric and pleasant. It kept my mind busy when I didn't want to think about certain things. One of my friends couldn't handle the high yet I freaking loved it. Nice rich purple and light green buds, hard hitting and a great fruity flavor. Warning: REALLY STRONG PUNGENT SMELL.â€

â€œOne of my new favorites. I think that it is great for both night and day use. PSD blends both sides together, joining to create a powerful, yet relaxing high.â€

â€œPretty strong effect but manageable. A little bit of this goes a long way. The high was pretty pleasurable and I felt like I was in control of what I was saying and doing, which sometimes is missing with similar strains with like effects. Other strains I've had like this can make you feel somewhat out of control, and too much of them can make you freak out. However, Purple Sour Diesel provides a good balance between ...â€
